attributes.action: make it an offence to send unsolicited commercial mailings to private homes and, by so doing, reduce waste as well as nuisance.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The volume of junk mail that reaches private homes represents massive waste of resources, since much is binned immediately.  It is probably to be found, unopened, in every household dustbin, recycling or not.  It can and should be stopped.

rejection.details: There are several petitions on this theme, for example http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Tax-Junk-Mial/ and http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/STOP-JUNK-MAIL/ Please consider signing one of these before opening a new one.
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
